testGroups.name: Level 1 Compliance - Basic checks
testGroups.description: Will validate the required basic endpoints. Validation will fail if it does not pass all these checks.

tests.name: API meta info - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the base endpoint return meta information about the API, and does it adhere to the schema

tests.name: Services list - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the services list endpoint return a paginated list of services in the correct schema

tests.name: Service by id - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the service by id endpoint return a fully nested service in the correct schema

testGroups.name: Level 2 Compliance - Extended checks
testGroups.description: Will validate all other endpoints. Validation will not fail if it does not pass all these checks.

tests.name: Taxonomies list - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the taxonomies list endpoint return a paginated list of taxonomies in the correct schema

tests.name: Taxonomy by id - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the taxonomy by id endpoint return the full information of a taxonomy in the correct schema

tests.name: Taxonomy terms list - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the taxonomy terms list endpoint return a paginated list of taxonomy terms in the correct schema

tests.name: Taxonomy terms list - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the taxonomy term by id endpoint return the full information of a taxonomy term in the correct schema

tests.name: Service at location list - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the service at location list endpoint return a paginated list of services at locations in the correct schema

tests.name: Service at location by id - API & schema validation
tests.description: Does the service at location by id endpoint return the full information of a service at location in the correct schema
